text: @realDonaldTrump You asked at your Tulsa rally what the difference is between a flu and a virus. Why don't you take a moment and try to educate yourself? https://t.co/sQJ0RcPxdc Oh that's right, you don't like to read. We're screwed! 💨🌊

urls.title: What's the difference between a cold, the flu, seasonal allergies, and coronavirus?
urls.description: All the symptoms seem the same for a cold, the flu, seasonal allergies, and coronavirus, also known as COVID-19. How do you know the difference? Here’s information to help you better understand the signs, symptoms, and treatments.
